Bash("C:\\Users\\Kabzon family\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\Python\\Python312\\python.exe" -c "
import shutil
import os

base = r''c:\\Users\\Kabzon family\\OneDrive\\Desktop\\crossword_solver''
folders = [''services/__pycache__'', ''config/__pycache__'', ''models/__pycache__'', ''utils/__pycache__'']

for folder in folders:
    path = os.path.join\(base, folder\)
    if os.path.exists\(path\):
        shutil.rmtree\(path\)
        print\(f''Removed: {folder}''\)
    else:
        print\(f''Not found: {folder}''\)

print\(''Done!''\)
")
